name: Save the sea #Teamseas
description:
Yo what's up😁✌🏽

The game is all about picking up trash from the sea before you run out of time. The game is endless and there's leaderboards abd stuff.

CONTROLS.

PC

W or UP - MOVE FORWARD

S or DOWN - MOVE BACKWARDS

A  or RIGHT - TURN RIGHT

B or LEFT - TURN LEFT

E - ZOOM OUT

MOBILE 

UP - MOVE FORWARD

DOWN - MOVE BACKWARDS

RIGHT - TURN RIGHT

LEFT - TURN LEFT

CLICK ON THE EYE THINGY - ZOOM OUT

NOTE: Do not submit score if your not connected to the internet

Checkout the video of how I made this game: 

This game was made to promote the #Teamseas fundraiser so yeah use the donate button in the game main menu to donate or click on this link www.teamseas.org . A dollar removes one pound of trash from the ocean so yeah donate if you can and may God bless you.

Created by Mr Beast and some other dude (I don't know his name)
